I got these for my sister as a gift for her birthday. I am hesitant to order jewelry on line because she has sensitivities. These came fast and in a nice EleQueen signed box with a pink velvety bag to store the earrings in. the earing set is a 4 piece all together as i see it. you can wear the whole thing as one pice or just the tow top tiny studs if you happen to have a backing for it. The stud part, which you can wear by its self or with the other part, is a beautiful round zirconia. what is Zirconia? well let me explain right quick. Cubic zirconia (CZ) is the cubic crystalline form of zirconium dioxide (ZrO2). The synthesized material is hard, optically flawless and usually colorless, but may be made in a variety of different colors. It should not be confused with zircon, which is a zirconium silicate (ZrSiO4). It is sometimes erroneously called "cubic zirconium". Because of its low cost, durability, and close visual likeness to diamond, synthetic cubic zirconia has remained the most gemologically and economically important competitor for diamonds since commercial production began in 1976. Its main competitor as a synthetic gemstone is a more recently cultivated material, synthetic moissanite. And there is a silver hang down that goes behind the ear lobe on the post of the stud before the backing goes on. It drops down about half an inch. The drop down has a very large clear zirconia. I was worried, when I saw them, that they might be heavy but they are not. These would look great on a medium to tall person. Might be a little overwhelming on a small person. At the end of the evening her ears were not red nor sore. There were many sales on beautiful earrings, and I wasn't really in the market for anything new, but these babies caught my eye right away. Now, I'm not typically a jewelry buy kind of a guy. Still, I love to buy my sisters and my wife a good pair of stud earrings and other jewelry. Like many folks, both my wife and my sisters love the dazzle of a gemstone, and though these are just standard CZ, these earrings are nothing but a Luxurious piece of art work. These were a great buy. EleQueen 925 Sterling Silver Full Cubic Zirconia Double Round Drop Earrings Bridal Modern Ear Jacket Clear

I would be the belle of the beach in this beautiful suit if only it were made to fit much larger chests, but it is not. I am 5' 2" and change, 128/129lbs, size 30I chest, and I have a short torso.  I bought the size 6. The straps are very well-made and extremely comfortable. The suit is well-made, sturdy and thick enough, it is intended to give a great silhouette, and I love the crossing pattern, but: I wish it hugged my body more from the sides, especially beneath the bust to lift the weight of the ladies. The chest area does not work, so much so that I don't feel comfortable posting a picture. The bodice portion has form to it, so if you are very large up top, the edges of those cups will press in. And you can't lift them up higher to account for that pressing because then you'd come out over the top of the cups.
If you have a full but not a very full chest (it is built for probably B,C,D cups; if that is you I think you should order) and have a torso that is a bit less trim than you might wish, then this suit will probably look great on you. If you are not (you are a moderate dress size but big chest, or you are super fit of any chest size, or you are flat chested) you should look for something else. If you are built like me: I bought the one-shoulder Jena OTS one-piece Maillot mesh suit from this same company (COCOSHIP), and that bathing suit could not flatter me more (I will go review it and post a picture). That one working so well is what made me buy this one with high hopes. I recommend you opt for that instead, and leave this suit to those women who are a bit more evenly proportioned and who are looking for something simultaneously sexy and comparatively modest. Those women will rock this suit.
summary: Exceptionally busty women will be disappointed

reviewText: Loved this bathing suit! Wore it on my vacation to Jamaica!
Came with a hole in the seem over a inch long and smelled of smoke.

Of the 5 or so suits I ordered and tried on from Amazon, this was the sexiest, with the least amount of coverage in the hip, but also the most comfortable.  The color and quality are gorgeous and comparable to suits priced north of $60 - $70 in my opinion.  Unfortunately, my cup size (DDD) was too large for this suit, which I don't think could accommodate much more than a C cup or a barely D cup. With the exception of the cups, the 14 fit me well, my measurements are 44 bust, 39 waist, and 46 hip.  I'm 5'2".  I found this suit to be a little short in the torso, so I don't think it would work for someone over 5'5".
Things I loved about this suit, the ruching in the front is a diagonal pattern which hid flaws well, but didn't overwhelm or make the suit too heavy.  The straps are padded which made them extremely comfortable, I kept trying to make my over-sized chest work for this because I loved the straps and cup shape so much, so HOT!
The one thing I disliked about this suit was the scooped back.  Scoop backs have never worked all that well for me because I always feel like the straps are about to fall off..  The color of this suit is absolutely gorgeous. I included a photo of the inside of the suit so you can see how well constructed it is.
I can wholeheartedly recommend this suit if you're under 5'5" and less than a D cup.
I was in no way compensated for this review.

I didn't want to have to spend a lot of a swimsuit because I don't want to wear the same size next year! This suit fits great and works with my cover up and is surprisingly great quality. I haven't taken it out to the pool for a test run, but I'm pretty amazed at how well it worked, especially since I was expecting it not to fit or work cause it's harder to shop for my top usually. The straps aren't adjustable which is why I ended up going a size down, because I wanted my top to feel support and it felt more roomy in the top in the 16. This is a swimsuit made for curves and a larger chest! A+

I'm a backpack fanatic. My closest possessions always stay by my side, no matter where I go, so my bags get a lot of wear and tear. This back is holding up phenomenally. I keep waiting for the bag to rip like most others do, but it never happens. I waited to write this review, so I could see how it held up, and I must say that I am impressed. I keep a lot of tech tools in it for my job, and more than one laptop. Needless to say, this adds a lot of weight to it, but it seems not to even phase it. I love that the bag remains slim, as I can't STAND having a huge bunch of bulk hanging off of my back. If this one ever falls apart, which I doubt, I will be buying another one. It reminds me of the quality that the company that made my backpack used to have, but now lacks in. Carried that one for about 10+ years, and am anticipating no less from this product.

The problem I have with this backpack is that I only ordered one! I should have know but, one of my daughters had a nice backpack that we just brought for her and was happy with it until she opened the package containing this backpack. I ordered it for my oldest daughter and she absolutely loves it. I read the reviews and the only concern I had was the zippers. On this backpack they aren't a problem. My daughter is able to open and close it with the pack fully loaded. It is a very well made product with great stitching and padding. My daughter has adjusted it to herself with no problems and easily puts it on and takes it off even fully loaded. These girls are very hard on backpacks and most don't last the entire school year. I am hoping this one does. I always like to leave a review on any products I purchase online. This is one example after reading the reviews and seeing the video and pictures I felt confident in purchasing the product. Thank you for reading my review
summary: My biggest problem was ordering only ONE!!! My daughters love this backpack!!!!

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these waterproof, poo proof, spit up proof changing pads!! Designs are really cute! I ordered the C set. Absolutely NO chemical smell on arrival! YEAH! They stay put fairly well on the bed or changing pad. They are not noisy. They will not crack. The top is soft flannel, waterproof backing is not plastic-y...don't know what to call it (see video! ;) ), but it works well! :) I washed and line dried...Not sure what is recommended, but I had no shrinkage. Sizes are perfect for various uses....Largest can work on an older baby or toddler' bed (will not cover whole mattress, but at least the danger zone! ;) Next size down I use to throw on our bed for quick diaper changes. Smallest one is perfect for sticking in the diaper bag. I am super pleased with these! I had some similar with our 1st baby, but these are SO MUCH BETTER!!! Highly recommend! I have received this item at a discount or for free for my honest,unbiased review...5 stars!

These Unisex Baby Waterproof Diaper Changing Mat Pads by October Elf are really nice. They are good quality and well made. They are well sewn with no fraying or loose threads. They have 3 layers and are made from flannel, waterproof TPU, and bamboo fiber terry cloth. They are thick and absorbent.

There are 3 different size changing pads. Each pad has a different bright and cute design on it. The smallest one is 11.8 inches X 17.7 inches and will fit great in a bassinet, car seat, stroller, swing, etc. The middle one is 19.7 inches X 27.6 inches and will be great for the crib, sofa, etc. The largest one is 27.6 inches X 31.5 inches and will be great for the bed, the crib, etc. They have a warm flannel side and a cool bamboo fiber side.

This is a nice set of changing pads. I'm getting a new grand son in a month and these are for him. His mommy and I are both happy with them. I would definitely recommend them. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are based on my own experiences.
summary: Nice Set of Diaper Changing Mat Pads

This is a wonderfully comfy maternity and nursing bra with clip down cups.

 It is extremely stretchy and very comfortable.  Its comfy enough to sleep in, even! It is an awesome bra to wear now that I'm nursing.

I got the size XL. Before pregnancy i was a 36 DD. Let's face it, I have a giant chest. It was giant before, and it's even more giant now that I am nursing. This bra is great and wonderfully comfortable.

This bra kind of reminds me of a bra that I have that's made by Bravado, except this one is much more affordable, literally half the price. This one is a very nice neutral beige color, and it has some extra stitching in the front so you have two separate bra cups so you don't get the "sports bra uniboob" going on with your figure.

The cups snap down individually, and they snap down all the way, there is no extra cloth that you have to pull out of the way to feed your baby. The snaps are secure, and you can snap them on and off with one hand easily. Which is definitely a good thing when you have a baby screaming and scratching at you to get at the milk! This bra is very well put together, the stitches are secure, and the cloth is a good quality.

This is a great bra, and I would definitely order it again.

I hope that you found my review and pictures helpful. Thanks for reading.

reviewText:
So, it's adorable in person!

EXCEPT that the collar circumference is gigantic. I had an extra maybe 6 inches around my neck! so you have to pretty much wear it open. Also the shirt is a giant box. Not that long in the body, so best worn under something (sweater/vest/sweater-vest) and the sleeves are, of course, too short. So you have to really work it to make it work, but if you do, it looks really cute.
Fabric for the shirt is also a really cheap poly, so that just is what it is, I guess. I'm planning to take it in on the sides so it is not so huge & boxy, but haven't gotten to it yet.

reviewText: Awesome jacket! Outstanding quality. Fits perfectly. Extremely satisfied. Well worth the price.
Great jacket.

I received this jacket last week and I cannot be happier with it's fit and style. The jacket fits me really well. It's quality is excellent. I like to wear my jackets fitting tight, but not suffocating. I do not like baggy or loose jackets. So I ordered XXS. Fits me great. My V taper shows well and my waist looks slim in it.

It came pretty fast, within a week and half, even though it shipped via DHL from Pakistan. I was able to track it from start to end. The seller's emailed me right after I placed the order on Amazon and reconfirmed the size. They are polite on email.

The jacket is warm and will keep me warm in winter and keep me looking like Steve Rogers. I would buy again.

Its true the jacket has a brand new faux leather, plastic, type smell but it's like the smell of a new house with new carpets. The smell is not over powering and is wearing away.

Again, to reiterate the jacket is a great way for me to dress like Steve Rogers from winter soldier movie. The quality is excellent. I don't mind the new jacket smell and will buy again.

Pros: it fits me well, it's not baggy or silly looking, stitching quality is good, customer service is good, the star on the front looks good as do the stripes.

Cons: the blue of the jacket is very dark blue, darker than the blue the actor wears in the films. The plastic smell of the jacket and also the jacket has no star on the back side.

I went by the reviews and originally ordered a larger size as the reviews suggested but had to send it back as it was way to big and get the size the company had for my measurements and that one fit just right.
 The quality is amazing. I thought with the price I might not get that well of a product but it's quality well surpassed it's price. It's very warm and greatly detailed. I love it very much and wear it often. Only thing I would change is for it to have outside pockets.

Fits perfect. I am 5"9' 165lbs in slim & muscular shape. The lining is super warm cause it's made of White Duck Down Feathers. The quality is overall well stitched and the buttons are on point. It's a dull matt finish which I kind of prefer than having something shinny.
Now for the Cons:
It's not tapered in. Jacket is wider than expected. The length is also not as long as expected. The zipper is on the left which leaves me to believe this is a women's jacket but I don't know the standards in china. It's made in China. Though surprisingly pretty well for china. I bought a MEDIUM which I received but that translates to an XXL. Is this made for Oompa Loompas?
And here's the worst part.
FAKE POCKETS! Do not buy and support companies that make fake pockets. We're men. We need our pockets. The one interior pocket is real. But the two outside pockets are completely fake. That's false advertising.

The bottom green part is a nice soft flowing skirt, feels like rayon. The top is harder to describe, a very sheer sheeting kind of fabric with embroidery on the bottom. I wish it was the same as the skirt. It has a stiffness to it.
 I wear a 10, I ordered the xxl, which is the biggest size offered. The arm holes are fine, and I can't deal small openings, so that's a positive, I'm a 36 barely c, I wish it was a little roomier across the bust, but that part is wearable. The cap sleeves are another story, there is barely enough fabric to go across, so as long as my arms are down by my sides it's fine, but I can't raise them...at all. I love a fluttery cap sleeve, so these are beyond a disappointment. Ill try splitting them down the center, but most likely will have to remove them in order to salvage this dress.
 Aside from the hem, the stitching is good in the rest of this dress.
All things considered, a poor buy and a big disappointment.  I can't recommend, and wouldn't purchase from this company again.

reviewText:
I got this leggings for my wife.  She told me that this is an essential clothing that she must have for many.  I asked her why and she said that this is the kind of outfit that can go for whatever kind of season we have.  She also like wearing this for some mini dresses.  Anyway, she also said that not all leggings are nice and comfortable to wear.  So when we received this, she already tried it on. She was happy how it fitted her.  It fit her perfectly and snugged her legs so nice. She said it is very comfortable.  It is not too tight nor loose as well. The length of the leggings was just right and the waistband is also perfect for the tummy. The fabric of this legging is smooth and soft and at the same time is durable and stretchy. The color was also attractive.  She was glad that it did not fade after washing it in the washing machine. With what the others said about it being thin, it was not really too thin nor was it so thick.  It was just right and not see through so this was really made of fine quality.  I did not also smell anything bad about this, like what the other one claimed here.  Overall, we were very much happy and satisfied with its quality.
I was able to get this nice product on a discount and I am happy to be able to share as well my fair and honest feedback about it.

reviewText: I have been addicted to leggings. I have more pairs of leggings that I know what to do with. These have by far been the most comfortable. The seams are pretty much non existent. That is what I love about these Basic Leggings Seamless Full Length leggings. I know it says that they are seamless but these really are. A lot of the other ones that I have say seamless but they really are not. These are very comfortable. The waist is stretchy and flexible. I don't feel like I'm going to pass out from the waist being super tight when I wear these. I am 5'2 and 115 lbs. These fit great! I still have wiggle room and am able to bend without the fear of ripping my pants. They are thick but not super thick. They are thick enough to not be see through. That is a plus. I do not need people to see what I am working with, you know? Got to keep a little to the imagination! You can wear these with just a regular casual top or dress it up and it will still look amazing. I am impressed with this legging because they hold up great. I washed them a few times and they still look great. Disclaimer: I received this product at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own and truthful.

I am giving them a 5 strictly because I am very happy with these shoes (especially for the price) and I don't feel like I wasted money. UPDATE - The belt still runs large - minimum waist size would be more like 30+" (instead of the 26" in description - see comments below).  But I wanted to update this review to mention how helpful and accommodating the seller has been.  The seller, Jasgood, contacted me after my initial review and has been working very hard on finding a belt that fits my needs  (which is not an easy task), and wanting to make sure the information provided in their description is accurate . They have been fantastic.  So, while I stand by my review as far as the description being wrong on the size - I would have no problem recommending this seller & their products.  They have been truly fantastic.

I rated these belts 2 stars because (on the positive side) 1- the price is very reasonable, 2- they are very stretchy, and 3- just because of the type a belt they are (where you can insert the prong anywhere along the fabric area) they are very flexible as far as size  BUT the stated size is very deceptive and misleading.

I purchased a black & a navy of the skinny style.  The description says:  The skinny style . . . for pants size 26-32.  The relaxed length  tip-tip: black = 36 and the navy = 37.  Taking into consideration the 1 to the prong, this leaves 8 / 10 tails (for a 26 waist). So, while the belt can technically be worn  the excess belt wraps over  of the way around.

I have a 26 waist which has forced me to look to kid belts.  I was hoping to wear these belts over tunic tops, which means I don't have belt loops to hold the excess tail in place.

Since they are extremely stretchy  they could be worn for much larger than the 32 max on the description  but for the low side they are pretty much useless.

reviewText: Cofery Replacement Lenses for Oakley Fuel Cell Sunglasses - Multiple Options Available (Black - Polarized) I have bought replacement lenses for every pair of Oakleys I have owned over the years... No matter the price they are hit and miss.... Seems the least expensive ones hold up better for me, I seem to scratch the Genuine lenses very easily. Things I have learned, always get polarized period... and no fancy iridium color coatings if you are hard on lenses, These lenses are for my wife whom I finally bought a pair of Oakleys for a few years ago....... But as always, she is hard on lenses... 2 dollar pair of shades or $200 Oakleys ....... These lenses are pretty decent for the price, polarized, fit well, just a tad thinner, but no biggie.... I can buy 5 pairs of these compared to genuine lenses, yea ,the genuine lenses are alot clearer and better quality,but you will be happy not looking thru scratched lenses period..... but if you hate spending money or on a budget these fit the bill nicely... Nice little cleaning bag they come in and packaged well..... Add the word "tactical" to your listing and should get the word out about these nice lenses. Rating 5 Stars.

Lenses were a perfect fit, just as tight as the original ones. Also just as dark as the "grey" lenses from Oakley. Will definitely buy again especially since the lenses came in a nifty little microfiber bag and arrived in two days with free economy shipping! Couldn't be happier with purchase.

I like how this watch looks. Both the band and the face look classy and elegant. The small crystals on the band are subtle they are not "gaudy". The watch has a stainless steel body. The band's maximum width 8". The package includes a tool to take out links out of the bracelet for a custom fit. The tools works quite well. When you need to remove links look for arrows on the back of the bracelet, they show the direction in which the tool has to push. The face of the watch is 1" wide and the watch is 0.3" thick. The watch is water resistant to rain and splashing but cannot be submerged into water. This watch is made in China. It include a manual which is in both English and Chinese and covers several Geya watches. This watch only shows time, so it is very easy to set. Overall, this is a very attractive classy looking watch. It comes in attractive package, the box has a pillow and this presentation makes it suitable for being a present. This watch was provided to me for review as part of a new product introduction. If you skeptical about my review because I received the clips at no cost I invite you to examine my reviews to see that I leave critical reviews when the products deserve it. Ali Julia review

reviewText:
I was so excited to receive this dress. It does fit as expected, I ordered an XL and wear between a 10-14 at off the rack and 5' 4". The fabric is so soft and does have some stretch, so if you are between sizes, you could size down if you don't mind it being a bit snug. The fabric does not sheer when stretched. The sleeves are bracelet length on me due to the gathered band. I can pull them down to wrist length, but they pop right back up because the band isn't snug around my wrist. It is too short for my comfort level as a dress, but I can wear it with leggings or jeans easily-it's more tunic length than dress length. The color is definitely more beige than cream and the navy is so dark it's almost black. The first one I received had a run in the fabric from the neck down to the hem. The seller asked me to wash it (assuming it was a crease), but when laundering didn't correct the issue, they immediately sent a replacement. The replacement arrive much more quickly than the original order.

Pros: Soft comfortable fabric, best for petites, tunic length, great customer service
Cons: Colors were not as expected, initial product was damaged (but eventually replaced by customer service), shorter than expected.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review. All opinions expressed are my own and unbiased.

It also did not come with the shirt already laced up. You have to do it yourself. The color is more of a cream/gray, not a true gray. As I am on the taller side, my arms are longer than average I would say, and the sleeves on this do not reach to my wrists. It also took 12 days to deliver to my address in WI. Was expecting much sooner delivery. Overall, not impressed.

Excellent delivery time. Quality watch for present to wife. The style and detail are exactly as represented in advertising.

Today I am Reviewing the Chameleon Ladies Skeleton Watch.  My wife and I were looking for a fun, updated and modern watch for her that would be a step up from her everyday watch.  We ran across this watch by Moog Paris.  She decided to give it a try.  When the watch was delivered, I signed for the delivery.  The watch arrived in a nicely packed box, all in tact.  The watch is a beautiful Skeleton watch, meaning that you are able to see all the movements working from the front and the back side of the watch.  When she put the watch on , the face of the watch was a little bit bigger on her wrist than she was used to but realizing the updated style of this watch , it certainly didn't take long for her to get used to it.  The Band is a VERY nice quality leather, and after wearing it a few times the leather has relaxed some and forms to her wrist like expected.
It took us about 3 weeks to review this watch.  I wanted to make sure it was keeping good time with the automatic self winding feature, and it does.  I have had no problems at all with the time being off.  It has been on the minute since the day I received it.  One other feature I noticed that wasn't advertised, is that the hands are glow in the dark.  I'm not sure how long they glow, when she goes to bed it glows and when she put it back on in the morning it is the normal hands, I do like that  feature. One of the many things I especially enjoy about this watch is getting lots and lots of complements.  I do a fair amount of reviewing , seldom giving 5 star review ratings.  Having that said , I am giving this watch a 5 star rating.  I love this watch.  In my opinion this Moog watch is everything that it was advertised to be.  I will and I already have recommended this watch to friends.
I received this item either free or at a significant discount in exchange for agreeing to review this Moog watch with my HONEST and UNBIASED OPINION.  I did spend my own money on this watch and my review is my own.  It is the same review I would have given if I had paid full price for this product.
summary: My wife and I were looking for a fun, updated and modern watch for her that would ...

This product was securely wrapped when it arrived.  Aside from the plastic that covered each one of the bags.  I especially like the color, as I can most probably spot it at the carousel at claim baggage.  I also liked the double spinner wheels on each foot.  The bags are light, so the empty weight won't take too much away from the required 50 lbs.  I have not used them yet, as I haven't packed yet.  But I will know how sturdy they are when they are in company with other bags and how they withstand the stress of airport handling.  I may give another review after I traveled and back.  I a happy that I bought this compared to my old ones which are made of fabric entirely, but which have served me well over the years of traveling.  And I maintained and took care of them well even though they were not the greatest bags.  However, in recent years, I accidentally spilled hot chocolate which I bought and drank at the airport when I was hungry, and that stain barely went away despite the fact that I wiped it good with soap and water. With this polycarbonate shell, hopefully, I would not have to worry about spills.  The only thing I miss from the old one, is that they have outside pockets which are very helpful for keeping little things that one needs in an urgent situation.  This hardshell obviously do not have that, which is negligible.  I would recommend this product for the qualities it has.

By far my favorite leggings. I was kind of nervous when I ordered a medium, because I'm bottom heavy (5'6", 145 lbs, 28" waist and 40" hips), but they fit perfectly. They have quite a bit of stretch to them, as well, so they are comfortable to workout in, even at a high intensity level. They don't become see thru either when stretched like some leggings do. I've washed them at least 50 times and they have yet to become discolored or faded. My only complaint would be the tag, it's big and itchy, but I just pulled it off and was good to go. I would recommend these to anyone.

I highly recommend these leggings and this company! reviewText: I want a pair of these but I don't know what size to get since they are unisex I am an 11.5 in women's so is that the size I should get

This dress is stunning!!! I needed a gown for a gala, but everything I found looked like a prom dress. You could def wear this to the prom but it's more tasteful and mature. I'm not about to spend hundreds on dresses this season, and have found some beautiful dresses on Amazon. (Surprisingly!) I'm usually not afraid to order Bc almost everything is free returns, so if I don't like it, I send it back.  I ordered 3 dresses for 2 galas, not realizing that the returns are not made to amazon, but directly to the company overseas (not free!).  I received the first one, and I was so disappointed. It didn't look outright cheap but it didn't look elegant. Returning anything to China is $60. So I was starting to get nervous I had thrown $130 x3 down the drain (different companies). I think one of the major differences though is that w this dress, I gave exact measurements. I'm a 34DD, a size 2, and short (5'1"), so dresses don't naturally fit me well. So perhaps some of the disappointment in the last dress was in the overload of material that made it look too princessy. Which is great for an 18y! But I'm a physician and don't think I can get away w the princess look anymore! Anyhow, I was super concerned that the top would not fully cover my breasts- that it would do that thing where it hangs off your breasts, and you don't see anything from the front, but they're totally exposed underneath. So i not only followed their instructions in measurements, but I measured from my clavicle to over my breast, and down about an inch. Don't know if this made a difference. I also sent a picture of myself-belly up, so they could see how I wanted it to fit.  Of course, I never thought they'd actually follow it; people usually do their own thing. Kind of like when you bring a picture to the salon and you leave w thick choppy highlights anyway. So I couldn't believe how right they got the fit! So if you want the dress to fit a certain way, you can def tell them, but be detailed so they have something to work off of. I didn't want too much skin exposed. It's not for my body type. But if I was skinny w a smaller bust, or going to prom, I'd prob want the dress to show a little more skin. Anyhow, it's not hard, they want like four basic measurements- bust, waist, hip, height (don't forget to include heel height)! Now, if you have any additional requests, then include that info too. If you're a young skinny girl, I suspect the basic measurements are enough!

Furthermore, I needed the dress for 5/4, and amazon said 4/29-5/11. So before buying, I contacted them, and asked if a 5/2 date was possible? They said yes, no extra charge or anything. Actually got it on 4/27. I really couldn't be happier. A dress like this in a couture store would be hundreds. The quality is so good. I'm in shock. The beading is remarkable. A lot of these dresses from overseas come wrinkled and you basically get what you pay for, but this is actually an amazing dress!!

As you can see the quality is excellent, and that's just me trying it on right out of the bag (don't expect fancy packaging- but it looks that good even though it's been folded for who knows how long, cheap dresses would have permanent indentations). I will try to post pictures after the event- w better lighting and shoes, this picture doesn't do it justice. But I put it up, Bc I know it's gala and prom season and I'm sure people are wondering if they should take a chance. So, since I did, here are a couple of pics. Sorry for my dirty mirror!!

MY BEST ADVICE- if you like this dress and you can see for yourself it's good quality- send your measurements!!!! Remember, their sizes are different than ours and you will more than likely be disappointed guessing your size, and it's annoying to return. This is actually a great deal. Any other dress in a store, I would have had to pay $50 hemming (for sure Bc I'm so petite), and depending on the dress, I usually have to buy a significantly bigger size to fit my bust and then have it let in, so the alterations alone can be $100. The only way you will be happy is if you make it to your personal size. it saves time in the long run Bc you won't have to go to a seamstress.

reviewText: I bought a large, and they got like a small.
too small

Preface:
 5'5", 120 lbs
 I wear a US size 3 pants size, mainly because
 I am 0% a** (I mean it's not inverted or anything... but serious "white girl" booty over here, I'm telling you.

With the lack of sizing information on the page, I think I assumed these would... fit into the "one size fits all" domain. Well, they didn't. They were MUCH too small for me. Plus, there's little-to-no give to the material at all. And so, we all know where this goes, yeah? They cut into the flesh, leaving awkward bulges and deep marks once I got them off. And please, let's not get started on the panty-lines those awkward bulges made underneath a thick pair of denim shorts. They're also - for lack of a better way to describe it - made... shallowly? Like the front and back are both super low-rise, hitting just above the pubic bone in the front and barely above the pertinent back area. It was a travesty because the design is so gosh darn cute.

I imagine they'd probably fit a size 0-1 that's a couple inches shorter than me, though... I'll recommend them to those of you out there fitting that description, if you're out there and considering purchase. Because not only are they cute, the bow's unobtrusive and material pretty comfortable.

Once last note: the description is currently (09/09/2016) referencing this item as "Sexy, Playful and Comfortable Open Crotch" - they're not open crotch. Which I was personally glad about, because I got them for a photo shoot based on the product images (which implied a solid panel on some of the other color options).

The folks at Kicty Official were kind enough to provide me with this travel money belt in exchange for sharing my unbiased review...

This is a nice look and quality feel item for travel or whatever your use might be (also makes a nice running belt). Love the size, flat design, and durability. The included carabiner inside for linking keys onto is a nice touch and overall this is very lightweight.

I've had this belt for over four months and it's holding up nicely. Personally, I'd prefer it if the inside (netted side) wasn't a light, creamy shade, because it rubs against jeans or clothes and easily stains. It is, however, true to color as pictured and without the bulge of a fanny pack..

It has a modern look and I think this would make a good gift for anyone who travels. The pockets are perfect for different sized items and are not lacking for the minimalist who wants to carry a couple cards, cash, phone, keys, and a passport. Under a loose t-shirt this can be done so inconspicuously.

It has an adjustable strap to go around the waist that seems well made and is designed similarly to a luggage strap. The fit is wide enough to be supportive while a nice, comfortable fit. For reference, my hips are 38" and I can wear this comfortably with room to spare.

RFID protection is a nice added feature that gives me peace of mind. This would also have good use for while laying by the pool. Because it's nylon, lies flat, and could easily wipe clean, it could lie under a beach towel to carry the few necessary items while staying at a hotel.

For currently under $13, I think this is a good value and I'd recommend it to others. Uploading some photos so you can get a closer look at it upon arrival. Smile. Hope this is helpful!
summary: Nice Travel Belt With Various Uses... See Photos~

reviewText: This is a nice wallet.  The leather seems to be of very good quality and looks classy.  Has 8 slots for credit cards.  Seems to be a bit bulkier than my previous (non RFID) trifold.  But, I guess that is to be expected.  One little, very minor drawback:  It will allow a picture sleeve to be added, but only on the left side of the particular compartment you choose (you can slide it in the center or right side compartment).  The picture sleeve I was using in my old trifold needed to go in on the right side.  If I put it in on the left, then the pictures (or credit cards) will fall out of the wallet because the opening is now on the bottom.  Not a major deal.  I will just go get another picture sleeve that will allow for left side insertion.  Of course, once I do add the picture sleeve, the wallet is going to get even bulkier.  I will have to see how much bulkier it will get at that point.

reviewText:
This is a great wallet to take with you when you don't want to drag out your entire purse, but you need your essentials.  It has slots for up to 12 cards plus your identification.  You also have a side for cash and this clutch is designed to hold a Galaxy Note 5 phone as well. I really like it when I am going to the farmers market or a sports game. I do not want to put my purse on the dirty arena floor, so I just use the attached wristlet and keep it close to me. It also comes with a stylus pen that actually works.
As you can see in my pictures I got the pink one. The purse itself is a nice soft subtle pink.  The material feels like leather, but I do not believe it is.  The zipper is strong and I have had no issues with that at all.
Your phone is tightly secured inside of the zippered pouch, so you really have everything you need.
I have resourcefully put everything in this wallet and keep it in my purse.  When I want to just run into the store I just pull this out so I am not toting the big bulky purse around.  So far I have been using this for over 30 days and it has held up well.  There are no scratches on it, zipper continues to work, no tears in the material or thread coming unraveled.
Disclaimer  I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are of my own and not influenced in any way by anyone or the discount I received. I do not give out 5 stars unless the product meets my qualifications and standards and this one does.
1. It is not overpriced
2. Workmanship
3. In this case the number of slots for my cards
4. The clear ID slot
5. The zippered portion that securely holds my phone and money
summary: Great Clutch that has excellent workmanship, plenty of space and doesn't break the bank on cost

However, aside from that, they're cute, and the two zippered pockets are functional and large enough for your ID and some cash. your keys, and a smaller mp3 player (like...just slightly larger than a credit card).

Recently, my sons have enjoyed dressing up for church, and are very interested in bow ties.  After looking online, I decided to give this bow tie set a try, since the price was good. This set includes five pre-tied bow ties in different colors and patterns.  My son's particularly like the two polka dot ties, and the blue and red striped ties.  The brown and black ties are a little boring in my opinion, but may look good in a formal situation like a wedding or funeral.  What I love best about these ties is how easy they are to put on and off.  Also, they are adjustable, so they can fit my boys of different ages.  The material looks great, and they are made well.  For the price, I think these are a great deal!  My sons are loving these bow ties, and I love how cute they look!  I would definitely order from this company again.  These ties would fit toddlers, (probably babies too) up until about age eight or nine.  Then they would need a larger size of bow ties.  I did receive this product at a discount for an honest evaluation.  Our set shipped quickly, are made well, and free of defects or problems, so I highly recommend them!

So happy with this purchase. I love each one of the bow ties, they are really nice patterns and colors. I bought them for my two young boys and they look adorable one. I enjoy that they are pre-tied (as I have no clue how to tie a tie) and that you simply clip the back. The band is adjustable so it can fit any neck, which means they fit both of my boys. The fabric they are made out of is really nice and make any dress shirt pop.

These Pre-tied Bow Ties by Cloris Accessory are just perfect for my little man! He hates wearing ties of any sort, but was excited about these. This set comes with a great selection of colors and designs. The bow ties are all made of nice thick quality fabric and are well made. Each bow tie is pre-tied and attached to an adjustable elastic strap that will easily accommodate varying neck sizes. There is a plastic clasp on each end of the elastic band, that hook together and lock into place. What a great way to look sharp in just seconds! These prints will go perfectly with my little guy's navy blue suit. I love that his look will now look more versatile on Sundays. Plus, we have a black bow tie for more formal affairs. So grateful for the simplicity of these bow ties. No worrying about trying to get ties tied as we are rushing out the door to church. My little man can put these on himself! Plus, he will not have to worry about them being to tight and uncomfortable, as they can be adjusted to what he feels happy with. Win-win for us!

Disclaimer: I received a discount on these items in exchange for my fair and honest review. All opinion expressed are my own.

reviewText: Great quality!
Very nice but not as warm as I hoped for.

I bought these for my husband to take on an early spring vacation.  Our Mackinac Island destination had predicted temperatures ranging from the mid 30s to the 60s. We wanted to pack light since there is no motorized transportation on the island.  He decided that he needed a set of long underwear as a base layer, rather than packing heavy winter clothes.  These were perfect for the weather we encountered.
I gave them four stars because of their low cost.  (If they had cost much more, they would have been a 3 star purchase at best.). However, they are very thin, certainly not winter weight.  My husband really disliked the fact that they did not have a fly.  I doubt that they would hold up to frequent use, but as an occasional wear item, they are fine.  They were definitely a good value for the money, and served well as an under layer in the temperatures we encountered.

reviewText: Had one pair for less than a week and they broke

Thinking that these were the glasses I had ordered before, I looked forward to receiving them before we went on vacation.  Sadly, as soon as my husband put them on and it was too far to return home and get another pair, the 1st pair broke.  He was without sunglasses for a beach vacation but was relieved that he had more at home.  The next pair lasted a few more hours than the 1st, breaking in the middle again.  Hoping that it was just not possible for them to be so poorly made, we got out the 3rd pair.  Needless to say, the 3rd time was not the charm and we have 3 pairs of broken glasses in less than 24 hours of use.  If you are looking for these types of glasses, go instead with the JetSetter brand...they are made much better and last much, much longer.
summary: POOR product!  Buy from JetSetter instead and have sunglasses that actually get use for more than a trial fitting.

I like this bathing suit. I didn't know what to expect because I have never ordered a bathing suit without trying it on in the store first. I'm so glad I took this chance. I love the top. Because of the underwire I feel supported, which is usually hard to find in a bathing suit. I like that the straps are removable and interchangeable. You can not wear them, wear them as shown, or cross them at the back for extra support. The bottoms fit as expected and because they are high waist bottoms they hide the tummy areas I'm concerned about.

I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

After two kids, my belly isn't what I would like it to be. This high waisted bathing suit covers and hides my "pooch" awesomely. I'm pretty busty as well, but the top fits nicely and I feel secure. The hardware used (clasp in back, adjustable rings on straps) is very nice quality metal that will hold up over time. The cute little ruffles down the front of the bottoms is just the right amount of distraction and is slimming at the same time. I love the two fabric patterns- they go very well together. The colors are a little off. There is way more orange and it is bright in the flowers. I probably wouldn't have purchased had I known this because orange isn't my favorite color....but it works and actually looks pretty good with my skin tone.

I purchased this suit at a discount and all opinions are my own.
summary: my belly isn't what I would like it to be

I would recommend this but would only order one size up at the most if I were you. I was lucky enough to get a discounted price to try this item out and let people know how it worked out for me. I like this suit; it's cute and fits pretty well. I have yet to swim in is, so I am unsure of how well it hols up in water, but I like it dry. I ordered a size larger than I would if it were made in the U.S., and it's a little big. I'm actually a bit reluctant to wear it in the water from the first time in case it stretches, as most swimsuits do, in water. It appears to be well made, and I love the clasp on the back of the top; it is one that would be very difficult to get undone while swimming. Meaning, I would feel comfortable wearing it on water slides or doing water sports. I am excited to wear iths over the summer! It's cute and seems "sturdy."

*I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. My opinions are 100% my own, and not in any way influenced by the seller or manufacturer.
love love love

I'm not too thrilled with this bathing suit. Its a beautiful bathing suit, I guess it just really doesn't work for my body type. I am 5'2 and 150 lbs. I have a 34c chest and I wear a size 4-6 in bottoms (depending where on the store). I think I am just too short for a high waisted bikini, so it just doesn't flatter my body type very well. I ordered a large where I typically wear a medium in everything else, the top fits perfectly (as I mentioned I am a 34c) but the bottoms are a little snug. Depending on the size of your chest and your thighs, I highly recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes depending how you like your things to fit. The large is even boarder line too small for the bottoms. Another thing I want to comment on, the top is basically like wearing a bra. The design of the top itself,  and the way the pads are situated, it is like wearing a push up bra. If you are uncomfortable with the thought of walking around in a bra (that is basically what this top reminds me of doing) than this style bathing suit may not be for you. I think I am going to keep the suit just for the top, because I personally do like the fit and style of it, but there is no way I can wear the bottoms. They just fit me weird and the bottoms just look funny on me. I gave the product three stars just because I find their sizing weird. It is weird and annoying to me to have to go up a size or even two sizes from your typical size, and in my case, I wouldn't be able to go up a size for the bottoms because you have to order the two pieces together and the xl top would be way too big. Gorgeous suit, just weird sizing.
This is very well made for the price. I would order again.  I ordered a size up because I heard it ran a little small and I'm glad I did.

reviewText:
Really love this suit, it was purchased for my teenager and finding a suit that meets both parental approval and teenage fashion approval is almost impossible. Fortunately I found this and showed it to her, shortly after she mentioned she was really starting to like the older style swimsuits. It lined, which as mom I appreciate very much, and it doesn't feel like it's a cheap suit that will fall apart after just a few times wearing. The ONLY reason I don't give it 5 stars is because the back clasp is the oddest clasp I have ever seen on a bathing suits. Neither of us could figure out how to get it to close, but fortunately it is something I can easily fix for her. Great suit, and really it wonderful to not have to spent $40-50 for a suit she will grow out of by next summer. Fit was just right, which I was actually surprised by, but very happy about. I'll actually be purchasing another one for myself (although for my daughters sake I'll refrain from embarrassing her and get a different pattern).

reviewText: So cute and good fit!!

This top was weird. the cup size was too small so it doesn't offer full coverage. Also, there is no support for the bustier ladies. It's really ill fitting. I waited too long to return so I'll try to donate it to someone else. On the bright side, I liked the print.

This is the first vintage/highwaisted style swimsuit I've ever bought and wore, and I was a little nervous at first wondering if the fit would be flattering to my body shape.  I've recently lost some weight, but I've never had a small waistline or hourglass figure, but this swimsuit is SO super flattering and cute!  The high waist comes up perfectly to the smallest area of my waist, and I feel it makes my waist look even smaller than what it is.  I love that the top has convertible straps that can be left standard bra type, or criss-crossed to racerback or even halter.  The only thing I would change is the sizing of the top, or allow ordering the sizes of the top and bottom separately.  I'm a D cup and the top is really too small and tight, but the bottoms fit perfectly.  I also love the vintage flower design!

I never really write reviews, but I felt like I should for this bathing suit. I am so pleasantly surprised at how well this bathing suit fit me. I am rather large up top so I was worried the top wouldn't fit right and I have wide hips so I was worried the bottoms would fit too tight. First off, shipping was so quick- it came in 2 days. The packaging is in a nice zip lock bag. The material is really nice and I love the pattern! I ordered a 4X and it fits me like a glove! I have a somewhat small waist and I love how it fits slightly loose around my waist and doesn't dig into my skin like most swimsuit bottoms. I am a size 34DD and typically wear a large bottom. I will definitely be ordering more of these bathing suits! If you are looking for a retro vibe in a bathing suit, I definitely recommend this one.

The suit is adorable, but it had to be returned. First of all, the color was nothing like I expected. I saw a pink and coral floral pattern on my screen (yes, I know they're variable) and so when I pulled something closer to neon orange or if the box, I was a bit surprised. I was willing to let that slide, but there was another bigger (or smaller, depending on how you look at it) problem. I'm 5'7", around 220lb, generally wear a size 14 bottom, and wear a 38DD top. The bottom fit perfectly. The top, on the other hand, is not meant for anyone larger than a B cup. I've never been cut in half so hard. So it seems to me that they're either sending tiny tops with all bottoms or they have no idea that big girls also tends to have big boobs. Even a B cup is more than a handful with a 38 band size, folks.

Lucky for me, it goes up just above my navel and to my natural waist and gives a nice silhouette. That being said the material might be a little thin for some (might feel a bit cheap) if you're looking for a lot of support on the bottoms (particularly smoothing out the lower tummy) you probably won't get that entirely, but the pattern and style do help detract if you're seeking a sleeker look. For me, a 36D, I felt the top part was adequately supportive and comfortable! Overall, it is a comfortable bathing suit and I am pleased with the fit and product considering the current price on Amazon. reviewText:
I am in love with this cute dress! I have been wanting to expand my dress collection for awhile now. Normally I ma not into wearing dresses at all, but sometimes you need to. Plus, then you don't have to wear pants, which is always a win! I purchased this in a medium. Normally, mediums fit pretty well in dresses. I was surprised by the length. I was expecting just a couple inches longer, but my butt has gotten bigger too, so that could be part of the reason. The sleeves do not hit the full length to be considered long sleeves, but I woul dhave just pushed them up anyways, mostly because that is what happens to any long sleeve I wear. The neck line is fantastic. It does not show any cleavage at all; I would have been fine either way, but just as a reference for this one. The scoop neck in the back does go lower than the front in my case, but not too low where my bra is exposed. The slit/ extra layer at the bottom gives it just enough of a cute/ fashion edge to ensure that this is not just a regular dress. The matieral is great, it will be plenty light for the warm summer, but could be paired with tights/ leggings and boots in the winter. I woul dnot wear this dress for professional attire, but probably just as a day or night on the town.

The rouched section on the top is very small, so unless you have shoulders like a pixie, the rouching will cut off about halfway down the boob -- and I'm an A cup, so it's not like I have big boobs to cover. The abbreviated bust looks very strange. It is also longer than I expected, and the length looks a little gross. Though the dress fit without being too tight, the proportions were really strange. Between the tiny rouched bust, the small space allotted for your butt, and the long length, I have no idea what measurements they expect a size large woman to have. It's almost as if they just think "large" means "tall." I put it on and wore it around my apartment for a couple of hours, and the rouched bust kept creeping up even more, making it look even weirder. Basically, don't buy this unless you're very slender EVERYWHERE.

Also, I tried to return, and it was a nightmare. Cost to return was almost as much as the dress itself. Not worth it. The seller tried to convince me that I did, in fact, like the dress. Eventually I got half of the cost back, but I'm still out money for a dress that is awful.

As The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask is one of my favorite video games of all time, I wanted a t-shirt that proudly showed my status as a fan. Problem is, t-shirts of video games of the Nintendo 64/Playstation/Sega Dreamcast generation typically don't have large-scale production (hopefully this will change in the coming years). With the release of the game on the 3DS, however, merchandise like this t-shirt came out, and I was excited to pick this up at my local Hot Topic.

The design is simple, but really effective. The bright colors of Majora's Mask really pop in comparison to the black background, and that wide-eyed gaze of the mask is definitely haunting. It's pretty form-fitting, so buy a size up if you're looking for something more loose (I'm 5'10 and weigh 175 lbs and bought my actual shirt size at "medium", so I attached a photo to this review for some reference). The mask graphic and game logo both haven't shown any signs of wear after several washings, so it's a pretty durable shirt. It's fairly soft, too, so it just feels good to wear!

I've been waiting a while for a t-shirt like this to come out, and I was definitely not disappointed. It looks good, it feels good, and it'll definitely get you compliments from fellow gamers. I'd highly recommend getting it while Majora's Mask merch is out right now, and it's a great choice of apparel for Zelda fans of all ages. Kooloo-Limpah!

reviewText:
Versatile is an accurate choice of word for describing this clutch.
This bag is great for being a clutch, shoulder bag or a wallet and is small enough to accommodate all those functions. Small may be a misleading word, however. By small I mean it's not a bulky bag but in terms of volume, it is impressively large on the inside. There are multiple pockets, both zippered and not, on the outside and inside; storing a bunch of things in this is easy and it can accommodate a lot. There is one zipper on the top of the flap that covers the inside which goes down the length of the clutch when opened. It is an enormous pocket in terms of length, depth and width. It is the entire size of the clutch. There's another, smaller zippered pocket on the backside which is about half the size of the clutch which can hold quite a bit of stuff as well. The top flap of the clutch is held down via magnets so it's not free to open without some force. They're not incredibly strong magnets but sufficient for the purpose to prevent the flap from opening easily. Once the flap is opened, there is a zippered pocket on the outside that is half the size of the clutch much like the pocket on the backside. Next to that zippered pocket is an open flap that has six individually lined slots for credit cards and/or ID cards. That flap is also the size of half the clutch so there's room for other items like cash, not just the credit cards. Next to that flap is another open flap that has six more individually lined slots for credit cards, a deep pocket, and a zipper lined interior pocket for holding those more important things. Like I said, there are many pockets to hold multiple things simultaneously. It's a lot bigger on the inside than it looks on the outside.
So now moving onto the build quality. This clutch is actually really well made. The leather appears and feels to be of higher grade. It is scratch resistant as the product site claims and is thicker than you might expect. It's not at all flimsy, thin, or cheap feeling. The walls are sturdy and it has some weight to it; it's not overly heavy but it's not the lightest either which, in my opinion, is indicative of its quality. The zippers, too, are all of higher quality. They open and close with ease and do so flawlessly. All the metal: the zipper, its handles, and the side clips for the shoulder strap is coated to provide a smooth and silky surface. The zippers all have nicely designed matching handles. The coating is a nice touch and add to both the appearance and function of the bag. These may seem to be minor details but they've been adequately addressed by the company so as to provide a quality product. That leads me to the lining on the inside of the bag. The entire bag and all their pockets have individually lined interiors. The lining has a silky smooth texture and a nice, attractive design. I really like the material that's been used on the inside; it looks beautiful and feels great. It's not a felt interior so things won't get caught on it. Moreover, as I said before, the pockets are individually lined as are the credit card slots so everything is compartmentalized which makes organizing everything into their spots that much easier. Lastly, the stitching is excellent. The entire bag is stitched properly and efficiently so that it doesn't fall apart after just one use. It is also the same stitching and design around the entire bag inside and out for continuity which makes its appearance that much more elegant.
The bag also comes with two straps. It has one shoulder strap which brings the bag down to about waist level and another strap meant for wrists if you prefer a clutch like feel. I, personally, use the wrist strap over the shoulder since this makes a truly elegant clutch. I did get the "red" version but it's more of a pink/red mix rather than a traditional red color. In any case, it's actually really pretty and goes great with quite a few outfits.
pros
-very versatile bag- can be used as a clutch, shoulder bag, or a wallet with no straps- in any case, it's lovely
-individual shoulder and wrist straps are provided
-really well made bag
-leather is of higher grade as are the zippers and its handles
-zipper and handles are all coated for smooth and silky texture
-all zippers have the same circular designed handles
-many many pockets: 3 exterior zippered pockets, 2 open pockets with a total of 12 individually lined credit card slots, and one interior zippered pocket
-flap is held down via magnets so there's no constant unbuckling as my other purse has
-can hold a variety and multiple items
-excellent stitching
-interior lining is silky, smooth and all the pockets are individually lined so no pocket communicates with any other including the credit card slots. Each card is separated from each other.
-thick leather ensures this won't fall apart easily and reinforced the high quality feel of the bag
-really well packaged

This is one of the best clutches I've ever owned at this price point. Not only does it accommodate all my daily things but it can hold a lot more than I was anticipating. It's appearance can be deceiving in that respect. The interior lining is both lovely and functionally superior to other materials. The bag looks and feels great. Overall, it's not cheaply made nor does it feel that way. I love the way it was packaged, as well. It came packaged between cardboard flaps, in a microfiber like bag which was placed in a plastic bag which was then in a larger plastic container. All that packaging ensures that it arrives in flawless condition as mine did. Excellent in every way.
I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. The company did not compensate me and discounted merchandise does not ensure a positive review. My views and opinions are completely my own, honest and unbiased in every way. I provide the most extensive and accurate account of my experiences so that you can make a better decision. I have included some pictures of the bag I received and the various pockets it has.
summary: Remarkably well made and incredibly versatile

reviewText:
This is an really well designed leather purse. It has more pockets than anyone could ever use, is built very well, and looks stylish.

A woman's purse is often about style, and this one has it done right. I got the "rose" color, and it looks a lot better than the product page, more of a deep pink than rose in my opinion.

There are a number of things that stand out.

+ Construction. The leather is thick and  strong; you can tell it is genuine. A dual set of hidden magnets keeps it closed securely, but allows for easy opening as well. Construction is single stitching, but the stitching is close together and very well done. The zippers are a darkened metal that work really well against the rose color. The shoulder strap is somewhat thin - this isn't designed for heavy weights - but ties in well to the design.

+ Storage. You might have to call "Indiana Jones" to find stuff in this purse. It has a main zipper, an inner zipper inside the main flap, a large zipper on the outside flap that can hold full size sheets (folded over, of course), and an external zippered compartment. In total, six places to put stuff, in addition to six slots for credit cards, conveniently accessible once the main pouch is opened.

+ Style. It just looks really sharp, with a triple fold when closed and those darkened metal zippers. You will look good with this one.

There is one thing to consider when contemplating purchase. This is a "business casual" purse, not meant for formal or evening use. It is great for all around wear, due to the sturdy leather, and it will look good wherever you go, but it would be a bit out of place in a formal environment.

Summary: A great general purpose purse to carry lots of stuff in style. Highly recommended.

Please note that I received this free of charge, so I could review it.
summary: Stylish For Business Or Casual Wear, With Lots of Storage

reviewText: This is a very cute bag, so I was very disappointed when as I grabbed it for the first time heard loud crunching. I can't even imagine standing in the checkout line at the store trying to reach into that bag without being totally embarrassed by the sound. It is loud, and as if someone stuffed easter cellophane into the lining. Anyone standing next to you would hear it. I opened the bag and inspected it to make sure all of the shipping paper was out before making a final decision, and the lining is so cheap it actually snagged on my nail. The leather looked genuine, and the style, shape, and overall look are cute. I cannot attest to the durability, but with such cheap lining and filler, I bet there will be holes inside very quickly with regular use. As soon as I opened it and inspected it, I put it right back in the box it came in, and sent it back.

Well I guess a cheap purse is a cheap purse. The design is cool and the design is good. But its NOISY. The inside is some sort of crunchy material that sounds like Im wadding up cellophane. Itd kinda be embarrassing at the grocery store. Maybe if I wad it up a little it won't be so crunchy.
BEAUTIFUL. I hope it lasts!!! I just love this purse.

Absolutely wonderful purse! It truly is genuine leather, it looks and feels lovely. It has a total of 4 separate zippered pockets to keep valuables safe! It has 12 card slots for credit cards, two good places for cash or receipts, a nice wide pocket for my checkbook and pen and another roomy pocket for my iPhone 7 plus. And when you unfold it, the pocket on the flap actually 10.5" x 10.5" so it has that extra room if needed. Overall, the perfect design in my opinion! I'm thinking of getting another to have as the perfect gift. I can't believe I got such a nice leather purse for the price!
summary: Perfect design, Plenty of pockets, Genuine Leather! Go for it!

reviewText: I love this bag. I've actually had it for almost 3 years now, and the reason I'm just now writing a review is because after 3 years of HARD use, and honestly probably over filling it a bit, the portion that holds the metal loop to the bag so that you can attach your strap broke. However, I'm still giving this 5 stars because I am genuinely hard on my purses and this little thing has performed beyond expectations. The leather is beautiful and has held up extremely well, just some minor issues with zippers starting to wear out and now the stitching coming loose so that the loop fell off, but what can you expect from daily use for nearly 3 years?! I only wish this bag came in more colors, because honestly I am ready to change it up, but I will miss all of the space and the fact that I could carry a million lipsticks, my phone, a pack of gum, and all of my credit cards with total ease and great organization. I will say, it is also the perfect travel purse because it was easy to toss into my carry on and not have to lug it around separately. In short, this bag is wonderful.

Love this comfort cap.

This is my second bamboo cap.  I was advised by people on my cancer support group that after I lose my hair I should take care to buy only 100% cotton caps/turbines because living in Arizona it gets really hot here.  So I bought 1-cotton and 1-bamboo cap at a wig store after comparing several caps and found the bamboo product  (95% bamboo viscose/5% spandex) to be way more soft, comfortable, breathable AND cooler!  I then found them on Amazom for $10-12 cheaper and the exact same quality.  My new bamboo cap arrived on time and I absolutely love the color (kind of a hot pink or fusia)!  As mentioned by others it arrived hand-wrapped in tissue but also included a cute magnet!  I HIGHLY recommend this to product and will likely order more colors.
summary: Bamboo hat is better than cotton

reviewText: I love this dress except for the bust area. My chest is slightly too big for the room they give you. The rest of it fits just fine!

I normally wear a 6, sometimes a 4 in dresses, but I am very busty so I went with the chest measurement and got a large.
It is a very, very pretty dress, but it was much too large.  I might have been able to get away with a Medium, but I think I probably should have gotten a Small.  It's not that it really LOOKED way too big, but it was since I could raise my arms and the torso went straight up over my big boobs.
This dress is also a sort of rough cotton, so it's probably better for a picnic or some sort of outdoor thing than a cocktail party.
Still, it's totally worth the price and I really did like it, but it's much too large.
One final note: I'm 5'10" and this hit me below the knee.  Shorter people can expect mid-calf.

I am so mad about this dress. I read another review and saw pictures of the elastic on the back of the dress being poorly attached.  I think I got that dress after she returned it.  I don't even think sewing the elastic on the back will fix the way it bunches up.  The ruffles on the breast part are weird on the outer part near the armpits.  It just looks strange. As far as the fit goes, I got a large and it was slightly loose, but not enough to size down.  The dress has plenty of room in the hips.  The material is a stiff cotton, that may soften if washed. I am probably returning.  It's too much trouble to deal with as I wanted it for a cruise in a few days.

This jacket is close to the one James Bond wore in Spectre.

They got the extra arm length and the shorter waist length correct.

The zipper pulls don't match the stock photos, the movie, or even each other, so one star off for that.  At least they're YKK zippers.

There is no label inside other than size, which is odd.  The interior lining is nice and smoothe with two large open pockets.  The zipper is backwards like a female jacket; cant tell when its zipped.

Its still a very unique jacket even if no one recognizes it from Spectre, and Id consider it a Fall weight.

The only possible deal breaker for me is the shoulder area. It has too much sewn material which makes them look pointy like it has hanger marks. Ill have to see if those can be tamed some.

The thing about Roamans is that they specialize in larger, plus sizes.  Keep in mind that their small is like a 10 or something.  Their 1x,2x,3x, 4x sizes are a lot like Lane Bryant's or Liz brands.  They are a bit larger, one size or so, than Just My Size brand.

This shirt fits great.  I have this in 3x and now 4x.  This time I got a size up because I wanted to wear it with leggings, and I wanted to make sure it covered my belly and tail.  It does.  :)  It is very comfortable,  well sewn, and versatile.  4x isn't tight anywhere, and fits my bust (G cup) with some looseness and comes down to the very tops of my thighs.
I got the multicolor blue and red and white top.  I also bought the Roamans royal blue leggings to go with it.  It matches great and makes a nice easy on, comfortable outfit for casual wear.

The pros: The boots look great. The stitching looks like quality. No loose strands or weird looking stitches. For man made shoes and the price, they are nice boots.
The Cons: I felt they were too narrow an squeezed my feet. The top ankle area was also too tight. I had to leave the zipper slightly undone. Also, there was NO arch support. I had tried to put in insoles, but that just made the boots tighter on the feet and I could not put them on.
Conclusion: It's tough to find shoes/boots that fit properly online. I would suggest getting feet measured so you know exactly what you wear. I have now done this and found that these boots, had I done it previously, would not have worked for me.
Specs: Synthetic, Man made sole. Shaft measures approximately 8 from arch. Synthetic upper, synthetic sole. Measurements approx: Heel 3.5", 8.25" shaft, 10.5" opening circumference. Non-skid sole and cushioned foot bed. I was offered this item at a discount in exchange for my honest evaluation.

This bag is SO much nicer than I even expected or hoped! When the Kailee waterproof backpack arrived, I was so happy to see the beautiful pink color to begin with. For that in itself, I give the bag high regards. Then, when I started taking it out of the tiny bag it was in, I realized that the little bag was actually a pocket on the backpack itself! It then has a velcro-type of closure. The backpack also has two mesh outside pockets that you can put your water bottle and phone in, so you don't have to open the bag to get to your phone. There's a divider in the main part of the bag, but no inside zippers or pockets.

This bag is awesome to travel with. Pull it out of your purse and you have another carry on, or you have something to put all your goods in when you are at flea markets. Definitely an awesome extra bag to have when traveling. This serves its purpose very well. The bag is water resistant, but not water proof. It does a great job of repelling water and keeping items dry inside.

The shoulder straps fit well, and the backpack was easy to carry. It's very very lightweight - I checked and it does weigh a little over 5 ounces so if you are like me and your suitcase pushes the weight limits imposed by the airlines, this backpack won't push you over the limit!! The longest part of this bag is 17 inches so you can fit plenty in it!

I could even see using this bag to take to out of town running events, since there's plenty of room to pack everything and I can feel safe knowing it'll stay dry too! I received this product without cost in exchange for my honest review. Thanks so much! Great job Kailee!
summary: I can use this bag for out of town running events since there's plenty of room!

reviewText: My whole family makes fun of me because I have so many bags laying around the house. So I thought why not add another to the collection? What they don't know is that I actually use each and every one of them for different purposes. I really like this one because of the bold bright pink color. I wear a lot of pink so this will go great with my wardrobe. I also like the fact that it is lightweight so its perfect to take on quick trips to the gym or store. And because its so lightweight, it folds up into a nice neat little package for easy storage. I can just throw it in another bag when not in use! It has two mesh pockets, one on either side which are great for water bottles and other small items. There are also two smaller zipper compartments on the front. One large main compartment is perfect for books, clothes, or bigger items you may need to carry with you. There is definitely plenty of room and plenty of separation with this bag. I love the fact that everything will have a place and it will be easily accessible. Makes travel a lot easier. I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText:
The main issue for me with this shirt was its quality - it wasn't terrible quality (in terms of stitching), but the fabric selection was poor. The fabric was thin and somewhat sheer and I hated that the polyester chiffon was clingy and static-y.

I did like the blouse's silhouette. I ordered it in blue, and the color was true to photo color. But I thought the metal d rings to hold up the rolled-up sleeves (which weren't pictured in the model photos) were a terrible touch.

The fit was a little big on me (I ordered the smallest size available) and the sleeves were too long. For reference, I am 5'0, 32/24/35 and 100lbs; so take my issue with sizing with a grain of salt. The sleeves also had a slightly flared bell-sleeve type of thing going on.

Besides what I mentioned above, this would have otherwise been a 5-star blouse.
