Love this bag!

I want to get one thing out the way for potential buyers. The amazon pictures make it appear that the bag is pretty decent sized and may appear comparable to a usual targus or swiss gear bag but it is not. I am not trying to say this is a con of this product, I am saying this so you set your expectations before you hit the Add to cart. This is the primary reason I am showing a picture of this product with the swiss gear bag I have that I take to work daily. These swiss gears are full size bags which can even accommodate 17 laptops.

The first thing you would notice when you receive this bag is that it would not look like a bag at all. It comes in a very very compact packaging with just a string on top of that. You would in no way guess there is a back inside it. Once you open the packaging which is fastened using a velcro. The actual bag which is like super folded will have to be unfold the entire thing to reveal the actual bag. The shoulder straps on this are not joined when you get it for first time, I choose the black and red color and I don't remember what the listing said before, but when I received the bag, it was orangy color actually. I don't mind, just letting you all know.

So first thing you do is that you attach both the ends of the shoulder straps so the thing becomes usable.

Touching the bag, you will know that it is indeed waterproof and is of plasticky material. It is not actually thick so do know that. I see one of the amazon pictures putting laptop inside it. Now with such a kind of bag, I would personally be reluctant to put one in my bag. I am not saying that the bag is flimsy, just that I am reluctant to put something relatively heavy like a laptop, not because it will tear the bag and fall, but lest I drop the bag, the laptop would not have any cushioning and can get damaged, i prefer my swiss gear for this.

The bag has 2 side slot for keeping bottles. The shoulder strap which actually touches your shoulders do not have any padding as such and this is expected due to the extremely slim profile and foldability of this bag. The picture you see with bag full has an iPad Air 2 (with a bulky otterbox type cover), a soft toy, Gopro accessories set and a box of humidifier unit.  The bag did hold everything well.

My personal uses of this bag as I see it are, using to hold few gym items like small towel and other stuff. Another usage I want to put this in, is to have it for keeping my kids travel food and such. With it being waterproof inside out, if something spills inside, I don't expect it to ruin other things outside. When not used, you can fold the bag back in its pack but it can be little tricky because you may not be able to fold it as good as it came with. But I did somehow manage to do the best I could, check the last picture to see that.

The bag is best for small uses and putting light weight stuff and preferably no electronics. The title says camping but honestly it is not really for camping purpose, it would not hold so much and is not really that padded and not really heavy duty like swiss gear bags. But definitely good for other uses mentioned.

*I received this product as a part of promotion in exchange of a honest and unbiased feedback based upon my usage of the product.
summary: Great for short uses and light weight stuff, waterproof, not heavy duty and not for camping or hiking

reviewText:
This is a black backpack accented with white, gray, & red. It is about 16 inches high by 10 inches wide. It's a casual backpack to take to the gym or beach. It's not that rugged - not the kind you'd take out hiking and camping in the wilderness. The material is lightweight and thin without a liner. The shoulder straps width is nice at almost 2-1/2 inches but they are not very cushiony.

I was also a little disappointed as it's not exactly the same one I ordered. The one I ordered was a solid gray and had no branding. With that said, the style is the same (just different color designs). I like the black but I don't like the branding. It says kailee on the front of it in bright red letters almost 8 inches long. On the smaller pouch, it says the same but in bright white letters. There are also some strange looking floral hand prints and the word, sport. This all makes it look kind of busy.

Pros: I do like how it comes in the built-in storage pouch. The pouch that holds it is about 7-1/2 inches by 5 inches. Once you expand it out it just becomes part of the backpack. It's also easy to put back in within a minute. It also has a loop to hang it. And as mentioned earlier, it's very lightweight. It has two netted pockets about 6-1/2 inches by 5-1/2 inches that are great for holding water bottles. Inside, you've got two large compartments that will hold a lot of stuff. It's also water resistant. Great for when you have to carry things on the go and it can easily store away when not in use. Would recommend for anyone looking for a lightweight backpack.  Thanks to the company for offering the product to test and review for my honest opinion.

I used this bag for a 9 mile day hike I did this last weekend.
It feels like a cheap bag but it held a bunch of stuff and was comfortable to wear and didn't let me down.
Not much to complain about, does as advertised!

This is a decent light-duty water resistant backpack.  Mine is black with red trim and straps.  I was initially pretty impressed with the package as the entire backpack comes packed in an attached pouch that ultimately becomes an inside pocket when the pack is fully deployed.  The initial size is about the size of a softball and the entire package doesn't weigh any more than a couple of ounces.

Recommended uses would be a student athlete going out of town or to a practice game to take a change of clothing and some shower supplies, taking clothes to the gym, or as a really nice backpack for a bike ride.  However, I see no way to justify calling this a camping backpack.  It is just way too small and light duty.

The top of the bag is pretty small and you wouldn't be able to fit anything more than a junior size soccer ball through the opening.  There are two partitions inside, but not well defined.  The top zippers shut well and easily, but it is not a heavy duty zipper.  There are two outside netted pockets, but neither are very deep and while they would not adequately hold a sports water bottle, they probably would hold a typical throwaway bottle just fine.  The top elastic on these pockets isn't very strong but it is adequate to put a little pressure on the contents.  I see these pockets as ideal for holding a hand towel or something light.  The shoulder straps are pretty light duty.  There is a small amount of padding on the shoulders but overall, these are probably fitted properly to the size and weight capacity of the bag itself, which I wouldn't want to carry any more than about 5 pounds.  The lower straps are pretty narrow and low duty as well, basically there to connect top and bottom, not to provide much stability.

I also tested the water resistance of the bag and it passed all tests, however I would call this a water resistant bag, not a waterproof bag since it has basic cloth zippers.

Overall, it's an okay bag for some uses, but it is way oversold by calling it a camping backpack and calling it waterproof.  It is neither and these and the overall build are the reasons for reducing stars.

I was provided with a free sample product for evaluation and to provide a fair and honest review.
summary: Okay backpack when you don't have much to carry

reviewText:
I wear a cami with a t-shirt every day. First I did it to cover up my cleavage in my low cut t-shirts, now I do  it because I nurse and that extra layer means I don't have to worry quite as much about exposing skin I don't want seen. Because I need these every day, I like some that are more casual, and some that are a little nicer (like this one).

I used to buy these at Charlotte Russe, but going shopping anywhere with my toddler and baby in tow is a headache, so I shop a lot on Amazon now. I found these and ordered one just to make sure it was what I thought it was. It is exactly as I expected. The white is a bit see-through, but I wear a shirt over it so it doesn't matter so much, it peeks out at the bottom and covers my cleavage at the top. Don't wear it with a dark bra. The cami is skin tight, but unlike many other skin-tight shirts it isn't unflattering, it looks good. The darker colored cami's are not see-through if I recall correctly. I'll give it a few weeks and see how it washes, and if it does well I plan to order 3-4 more in various colors.
summary: Just like I used to buy in the store

reviewText:
These are great glasses. Despite the lower price, they are very solid and can take it bit of rough handling, making them a great choice for someone who likes to hike, jog, whatever, when they're outside. They are very dark. Not everyone likes this. I have light sensitive eyes, so this is a must for all of my sunglasses.

The design is super cute, but keep in mind that they are the retro cat eye. If you like a throw back style then you'll like these.

Two things I noticed out of the box. One, I had to adjust the ear piece a tiny little bit because the glasses were crooked. Additionally, they were a little tight going on, but they loosened up nicely. Neither of these issues was enough to reduce the rating by a full star. If possible, I would have given this a 4.5 star.

I purchased the Cat Eye glasses at a reduced price in exchange for my honest review. All opinions expressed are my own.
summary: Very Cute, Sturdy and Dark Glasses

reviewText:
This s*** is so cute and comfortable! Its made of 95% Rayon and 5% Spandex so it is really stretchy and soft. I wear a size 10-12 and this shirt fits amazing on me. As a mother of 5 kids my body is not what it used to be. With this shirt I can look nice and cover up some of those flaws. The scrunch at the bottom makes hiding my love handles easy. I love that it is loose on top and works it way into more fitting on the bottom. It can be worn all year around with the light weight breathable material. It can be dressed up with a skirt or slacks it also looks good with blue jeans. I feel every confident in this shirt, and when I feel good about my clothes I tend to have better days. I was concerned that it would ride up that has not been the case at all. It stays nicely around my hips, and the scrunches will stay the way I adjusted them too. Overall this is a stylish shirt that would look good on thin or larger women, it can work for work, nights out with the girls, or casual wear, soft breathable fabric that doesn't shrink when washed and dried, can be worn all seasons, and comfortable. I highly recommend this shirt.

I received Free to Live Women's Short Sleeve Dolman Top size XL at a discount or for free for my honest and unbiased review. That has not swayed my review in any, way my review is 100% my own experience with this product.

I got the XL and it fits as expected. The sleeves hang as pictured but what is a little different than expected is the bottom part. It looks like it gathers there but in reality its just a bit tighter on the bottom than on the top. That is what makes it look gathered. The material is ok. I got the charcoal grey one and I love the color as it is a bit heathered. It is comfortable and was a bit warmer than I expected when it was cold. So even though it is thin  material it actually performed ok.  I think for the price and the quality that it is as expected. It is 95% rayon and 5% spandex so it really stretches a lot. I did wash this in the wash and spun it in the dryer on regular heat and it washed well. I do wish it was a bit thicker hence the four stars but it still is a good buy and ok quality. I received this item discounted in exchange for an honest review.

Super cute top. I love the color and the fit. It's a fun, breezy top that's great for spring or summer, but can also be worn under a cardigan on warmer winter days.

Most "turquoise" jewelry is plastic fake and cheap. These earrings actually have turquoise stones in the earrings. The picture shows what they loook like exactly! I love the artsy look of the metal design around the stones. It doesn't show, but these also come with silicone backs so you won't lose the earrings. They are not too heavy and a little less than 2 in. long. These are really cute earrings and will work with the rest of my matching jewelry. The only thing I wish the stones had is the gold colored lines that often go through turquoise, but usually you will only see those on fake turquoise earrings. I did receive these at a discount in return for my unbiased and honest review, which I have given.
summary: Real turquoise stones, not cheap resin

GORGEOUS skin hugging dress! During my time of purchase, there was an option for an XL, but was unavailable. The option for that size is no longer listed, but I do hope they bring it back. I did go for the L. (I am an XXL/true to size) The large is extremely form fitting, but sexy and comfortable. I am 189 pounds, 5'3 and have a small bust but bigger at the waist and the bum. It doesn't give you that "suffocating" look. Definitely something I could throw a long back cardigan over (longer than the dress of course), or use this dress for going out at night (adult night life). It is stretchy so don't be fooled by the sizing option. If you're a 15/16 and below, I'm sure there will be some leg room for you as well, but I don't suggest getting this dress if your size is bigger than that. I thought this would be an absolutely fantastic little fun thing for my 11-year-old daughter to wear when we go out at night. I plan to surprise her next time we go out camping as I know as the sun goes down I'll be able to keep track of her around the campsite. These are great little novelty items and the ability for them to change colors and patterns make them extra fun for her. She squealed in delight when I handed them to her and said "Thanks mom! These are awesome!" My original order came as all one single color of green and not multicolor. The seller was contacted immediately and quickly sent out a replacement which had the correct multicolored lights. There are a few things that I feel could use improvement for this product. 1) There is no way to change out the batteries when they burn out. 2) Things are just kind of glued together and so I did have one where the fiber optic strands came out entirely because the glue did not hold correctly. But a quick hot glue gun repair on my own and it was good as new! This only happened to one of my six I received. 3) The barrette style that it uses might be difficult with thick hair in order to get it to clip (See video). Overall it's a nice fun product and I'm still very happy with it. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Great colors and good for camping or going out at night

reviewText:
These light up fibers for hair are OK. They clip in the hair like a barrette. You can turn them on and off.

The battery compartment houses 2 watch- sized batteries. It is rather large, unless you have VERY thick hair, they will show through. The light generated by the battery compartment is more noticeable than the fiber strands. The barrette is not very strong, it only allows a thin lock of hair to be used and it will not hold very well. Since the battery compartment is large and heavy, it is not held in the hair long or firmly enough to wear beyond an hour, even without movement.

I received this item at a promotional discount price for the purpose of evaluation in order to form my own honest and unbiased opinion and review. I am in no way connected or related to the seller.

Have to give credit where credit is due. So far, very pleased with the fit and quality of this shirt. I have broader-than-average shoulders and longer-than-average torso and arms, so finding a good-fitting shirt is a challenge. I ordered four different styles of long-sleeve shirts from Emiqude and they all fit well. The pocket also is very handy. I haven't had a chance to wash them yet, but given the mix of threads, I'm optimistic that they will hold up well and not shrink. Will update review if I find out differently. I also tried on similar shirts by Neleus and Tom's Ware, but those barely passed my belt line. These shirts by Emiqude are much better, lengthwise.

This shirt is great.

The fabric is a little more stiff then I typically buy but it holds its shape and doesn't seem to wrinkle even after a couple uses. The pattern is something I haven't seen before which really helps it stand out. I can also tell you that I've bought a couple other shirts from Emiqude before but I bought mediums and they ended up a little tight around the shoulders and chest area. I'm currently 5'6" and 166 pounds and have a 32 waist. This shirt that I bought was a Large and it fits great in the chest and shoulders but the waist is a little bigger then I was hoping for. Still though despite the minor changes I would want I remind myself this isn't a custom tailored shirt and since I just bought it online and it still fits this amazingly I'm VERY happy.

I really like the feel and because of the material I don't have to wear an undershirt if I don't want to because it's a good solid fabric and breathes nicely. This is my 3rd shirt from them and I think I will continue to buy them because the patterns are nice, the material is fantastic, and the fit is much better then any of the shirts you can buy off the rack at Ross, TJ Maxx, or any of the other shops I typically shop at. I recommend you try them out but I do suggest that you get a size up from what you normally do. I always wear medium shirts these days but the Large is what fits me best from them. Also, I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review but my honest review is that I really do like this company and all their shirts.
summary: Great shirt, nice fabric, good fit, and good price. Might want to buy 1 size up from normal.

reviewText:
My husband is 6'2" and weighs about 165 lbs.  It's been a rare moment to find a shirt that fits his slim figure; either the sleeve length is too short, or the width of the shirt is too large.  I ordered a large size for him since the description suggested ordering one size up for a "normal" fit, and the fit was perfect as my husband doesn't like his shirts being to tight.  The material the shirt is made from is soft yet crisp, and I washed it in a permanent press cycle (warm wash/cool rinse) and hung it up to dry.  It dried almost wrinkle free...instructions warned about using dryer.

Overall, my husband was pleased and I agree it was a good purchase.

I purchased this shirt at a discounted price in return for a candid review based on my experience with this product.
summary: Slim Fit Shirt - One Size Larger - Fits Nicely on my Slender Husband.

Normally, I wear a XL in polo shirts and XXL in button-ups so I figured this would be a good fit...WRONG! Oh well... I have a goal to work towards now! I WILL fit into this shirt before the end of this year!! At least I was able to get this shirt at over 50% off!

I just received this shirt and was very impressed as I saw it in the package. The colors are very nice, the blue is a shade or two darker than pictured but looks better in a darker shade with the blue and white. I did go ahead and order and XL based on the previous reviews. I normally wear a large at 180lbs. and the XL was a perfect fit, a size large would not have fit in the back/shoulders and arms would have been too short and I'm 5'11" so keep the sizing in mind and order a size up.

The material was much different then expected but I was pleasantly surprised. The material is almost like a dry-fit texture, very cool and lightweight so would be good for warmer weather to keep cool. It loos like it would handle spills and be easy to clean. The material is labeled as being 75% cotton, 22 % polyester and 3% spandex and feels very strong and durable. The spandex gives it just a little bit of give, which is comfortable and nice. I will definetly not put this in the dryer and use a low temp iron as the tag noted to keep below 120 degrees. I believe this shirt will hang dry very quickly and well due to the material. The only minor downside was it does look like it will need to be ironed after washing as it did come slightly wrinkled in the back area.

I have attached a picture as they say is worth a thousand words. As mentioned, I love the color, material and the fit runs slim fit as advertised so order one size up. I like to roll my sleeves up and the solid blue also gives the shirt a nice contrast when you roll the sleeves up because the rest of the shirt is striped. The buttons are heavy-duty, I buttoned and un buttoned the shirt several times and noticed that the stitching is very good compared to some other shirts that only have a string of thread holding the buttons on and they fall off after a couple of uses.

I received this shirt at discount for trying and providing an honest review. This shirt is actually high quality and lines up with any other shirt that I have paid $30 for so I believe it is a great value and great quality. I am going to see what else this brand Emiqude has to offer now that I have tried and approve of their shirts! I recommend these dress casual shirts to any man for work or casual-dress occasions.

reviewText:
This shirt is okay, but I didn't read carefully enough: It is actually 75% cotton and 25% polyester/spandex, so it doesn't feel like a cotton shirt. It feels very synthetic.

As for the fit, I am normally a medium, so I ordered an extra size up to a large. It fits like a regular fit, except that it's very long and must be worn tucked in.

Here are my pros and cons:

PROS:
-- Nice color! Nice feeling collar and pattern
-- Light material because 25% polyester/spandex
-- Fits regular if you get a size up

CONS
-- Feels very synthetic
-- Hand wash only!!! This is important, as it doesn't say this on the shirt itself
-- This wrinkles VERY easily, which is a pain. I thought that since it was 25% polyester/spandex, it wouldn't wrinkle so easily.

DISCLAIMER: I received this product at a discount in exchange for a review.
summary: Note that this is only 75% cotton, 25% polyester/spandex.

I absolutely love this material. The name of this fabric is called Modal. I had never heard of that kind of fabric until I received this shirt. I have always been a fan of rayon and cotton. But, now, I am a fan of Modal!
Modal is a type of rayon feeling fabric, it is made by spinning reconstituted cellulose fibers, usually from beech trees. Modal can be used alone or with other fibers such as cotton or spandex. But in the case of this shirt, it is 100% Modal! It is called the new "wonder" fabric and I do know why.
This fabric, Modal, combines the benefits of natural fiber and the wonderfully soft feel of modern microforms.

This watch is more of bracelet than a time keeping piece. It feels well made. It came with no documentation and it really does not need it other than figuring out how to open the clip. It has a clip closure which is possible (even though a little awkward) to open with one hand. The watch's face and bracelet are the same width 1 3/4". The length of the dial is 1 11/16". The bracelet length is 7.5" The back says that it is made out of stainless steel and that it is water resistant. The watch comes in a nice box with a pillow. However the box is taped closed when you remove the tape it pulls on the box finish and destroyed it. If you getting this watch as a gift be careful. This watch is provided for evaluation and review. I love the brand and outfit this is modeled after, but it can get pricey and I was eager to try this and see how the quality and look compared. I've had mixed experiences in doing this before and had no prior experience with Machbaby, so I was not sure what to expect.  I just love this outfit and am quite please with the quality.  My son will get a lot of use out of it.  Here are some additional thoughts on it:

* It runs approximately 1 size small.  I would definitely suggest sizing up.  If it's too big to start with, it will fit eventually.
* The top is more t-shirt than sweatshirt material -- I expected it to be like a sweatshirt, but it is thing.  That's fine as it's fairly warm where we live, but good to know before you buy.  The quality of the screenprint on the top is good and it doesn't appear that it will crack / show significant wear quickly.  The top is surprisingly soft. I cold washed it and hung it to try and it's still quite soft.
* The jeans have an applique fire truck. It matches nicely with what's on the top.  The draw string is functional which helps if you have a skinny child like mine.  Again, the quality seems quite good.

Overall, I'm very pleased. If you are looking for an outfit at this price point this is definitely a good option.

reviewText:
I cannot express in words the beauty of this dress! The product picture does the actual gown no justice at all! Now I will fill you all in on a little secret: this particular style of dress is actually sold as a replica my a multiple of sellers across the internet. but Sweet Girl by far recreates the dress the best! The beading in the bodice and the appliques on the skirt are absolutely beautiful and well placed.

And the customer service is superb; they were prompt with their responses and very attentive to requested alterations. Considering this is a wedding dress with an extensive train, I requested that they shorten the hem of the dress and the cape veil significantly as I was purchasing it for my sister's sweet sixteen. We gave them her measurements, requested the shortened train, and when the dress arrived it was absolute perfection: the train was the perfect length and the bodice fit like a glove!

Just one thing of note, the corset lacing in the back of the bodice is not purely ornamental, it is functional. That is to say, there are no hooks or zippers to completely bring both sides of the bodice together, the corset lacing is the only way to tighten the bodice. But as long as your measurements are correct, the lacing will make the dress very snug!

I would recommend this gown and this seller very highly! And in support of this seller, I have uploaded pictures so you all may see the craftsmanship first hand!
